description: This file is a shell script that retrieves and displays specific configuration parameters related to 'SinglePortForward' objects in the Utopia system, using a command 'utctx_cmd'. It performs checks for input arguments, retrieves namespace values, and outputs configuration details such as name, enabled status, protocol, ports, and destination IP.

methods.name: do_utctx_get
methods.description: Function to execute 'utctx_cmd get' with a given argument and handle failure.
